snippet: The news of Instagram's sale brings a sharper reality into focus - that the secluded and private corners of the Web where we can let our hair down and be our authentic selves are fewer and farther between with each passing day.
abstract: The news of Instagram's sale brings a sharper reality into focus - that the secluded and private corners of the Web where we can let our hair down and be our authentic selves are fewer and farther between with each passing day.

headline.main: Digital Diary: Instagram and the Internet's 'Secret' Places
headline.print_headline: Sense of Privacy Dwindles a Bit
